content.title: Would you like to go through the application with step-by-step instructions?
EN: CLEAN THE BACKSIDE OF THE ARM
content.description: Use alcohol wipes to clean the backside of the upper arm (green section).

content.title: EN: REMOVE TOP & LID LINER
content.description: Remove the lid of the applicator by turning. Then, peel of the top liner (blue liner) from the tray.

content.title: EN: ALIGN GROOVES & COMBINE
content.description:
Align grooves of the applicator and the tray. Slide the applicator all the way down over the tray until the two parts click together.
 ⚠️ Do NOT click the button yet.

content.title: EN: REMOVE BOTTOM LINER
content.description: Peel off the bottom liner (green liner) from the tray. Avoid touching the inside of the tray as much as possible.

content.title: EN: POSITION DEVICE & HOLD
content.description:
Place the device on the cleaned area of the upper arm.
 ⚠️ Make sure the device is at least 3cm away from insulin sites, scars and stretch marks

content.title: EN: COMPRESS & PRESS BUTTON
content.description: Push the device against your skin until it cannot compress anymore. Hold the device steady and press the button to apply the sensor.

content.title: EN: PRESS SENSOR
content.description: Press down on the sensor gently for approximately 10s to make sure it is properly attached to your skin.

content.title: EN: CONNECT SENSOR TO APP
content.description: Bring your smartphone(NFC on) close to the sensor to connect it to the Trendi app. Calibrate the sensor as instructed in the app and view your glucose readings whenever.

content.title: EN: APPLY OVERPATCH & RUB
content.description: Carefully apply the overpatch on the sensor. Rub the overpatch  on the skin to smoothen it out and ensure it is properly attached.

content.title: EN: SEPERATE & KEEP APPLICATOR
content.description: Separate the applicator and tray by pulling (slight force may be required). Screw the lid back onto the applicator and store it for further use. Discard the tray.
